title: The Unique Lifestyle of Dehradun India
text:
The Unique Lifestyle of Dehradun India March 1 2016 This page comes from the website NetGlobers. It has been printed on 2015-07-29 at 02:08. The original can be found here : . Travel report of India Cleanliness, hygiene, water quality, allergen control... Food safety Getting around, in cities or in the countryside... Is transport safe and reliable? Is public transport frequent? Are taxis easy to find? Transport Finding a safe place to stay, the cleanliness and quality of accomodation... Accomodation Being able to communicate with locals, or get in touch with people at home... And what about phones and internet access? Communication Medical facilities, emergency services, doctors, pharmacies, exotic diseases... Are the hospitals clean and well-staffed? Is it easy to find a doctor, or a pharmacy when you need them? Health care - based on 115 travel reports - by ishrat   
There are a number of factors that have led to the growth in demand and popularity of Dehradun over the years. The city has been a major centre for education and over the past two decades, it has emerged as one of the most prominent centres of economic activity in the region. There are many infrastructure projects currently underway to make the city more accessible from the National Capital Region. The overall growth in demand for housing here has been considered to be positive in the year 2015 and the main reason for this is the local economy. 
The government - state as well as central - has put in efforts for the development of the city. Over the years, the city has been seen as a major manpower hub of Delhi and National Capital Region. The overall growth in demand for housing here has been considered to be positive and the property business in the city has grown over time. This has been because of the rise of numerous industries here. The city has developed a culture that offers a unique lifestyle that is otherwise not found anywhere else. 
The lifestyle offered by Dehradun 
The city of Dehradun has been considered to be one of the most prominent new cities for modern development. It has been the hub of high quality education for a long time. The boarding schools of Dehradun are known for their alumni, many of whom have emerged as prominent personalities in the country. The overall growth in demand for housing here has emerged as a prominent new option for investment. The increased economic activity has also led to the demand for house for rent in Dehradun . The city is also home to the Indian Military Academy which has also been an influence on the lifestyle. 
The state and the central government have been pushing to develop Dehradun as a “counter magnet” to pull away the population from the over burdened Delhi NCR. The city is not only home to publishing services but has also emerged as an important destination for IT Services and the like. The overall growth in demand for housing here has emerged prominently and this has further been influenced by the many infrastructure development projects that are in the works. For example, the Delhi Dehradun Expressway is currently under construction to remove traffic bottlenecks to the city. There are special economic zones and IT parks established here which help the city become one of the most prominent new centres for urban property development. The overall growth in demand for housing here has emerged prominently in the year 2015 as a result of that. 
What has led to the prominence of modern lifestyle in Dehradun? 
The city of Dehradun has become a major centre of economic activity and therefore is drawing population from the surrounding areas. The enhanced economic opportunities in the city have led to the overall growth in demand for housing here and the urbanized culture has further ensured that the city develops a lifestyle at par with any metro. It has invariably been the gateway to the Himalayas and therefore is known to receive footfall of both Indians and foreigners alike. 
In Conclusion 
The overall growth in demand for house for rent in Dehradun is the direct result of the economic growth of the city. ...
